item.title: Install drush on drupal 8 site (using downgraded composer ver.1)
item.description: Intuition I was recently working on a client site, and I got to the issue where the site will show “Page unavailable” upon login. And upon the suspicion of a mis-placed module or uncleared cache, I wanted to install drush to perform some drush commands. I ran composer require drush/drush which will install the most recent compatible drush on my current working directory, but then I got this error: 1 2 3 4 5 6 .
